sentences.sCn: 佛罗伦萨的妇女往她们的耳垂上搽胭脂。

sentences.sContent: She had curly black hair and rouged cheeks.
sentences.sCn: 她有卷曲的黑发和涂脂的双颊。

synos.tran: 胭脂；口红；铁丹，[材][轻]红铁粉

phrases.pCn: 红磨坊（巴黎著名歌舞厅）
巴吞鲁日（美国路易斯安那州首府）

trans.tranOther: pink or red powder or cream that women put on their cheeks
If a woman or an actor rouges their cheeks or lips, they put red powder or cream on them to give them more colour

trans.tranCn: 〈罕〉红的〔只用于： R- Croix 〔英国〕纹章局四属官之一
